statements: SELECT * FROM Payment_Options;
SELECT payment_option_name, integration_method FROM Payment_Options;
SELECT payment_option_id FROM Payment_Options WHERE payment_option_name = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM Payment_Options ORDER BY integration_method DESC;
SELECT payment_option_name, third_party_service FROM Payment_Options WHERE integration_method = 'API';
SELECT * FROM Payment_Options WHERE payment_option_name = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_option_id, payment_option_name FROM Payment_Options WHERE integration_method = 'API' ORDER BY payment_option_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payment_Options WHERE integration_method = 'Manual' AND third_party_service = 'None';
SELECT payment_option_id, integration_method FROM Payment_Options WHERE third_party_service = 'Stripe' ORDER BY payment_option_id DESC;
SELECT payment_option_name, third_party_service FROM Payment_Options WHERE payment_option_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM payment_options WHERE fee > 50 ORDER BY fee ASC;
SELECT username, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT option_name, service_provider FROM payment_options WHERE fee <= 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM payment_options WHERE fee > 50.00 ORDER BY option_name DESC;
SELECT option_name, service_provider FROM payment_options WHERE service_provider = 'PayPal';
SELECT * FROM payment_users;
SELECT username, email FROM payment_users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT service_name, service_fee FROM payment_services WHERE available=TRUE ORDER BY service_fee ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE status='success' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM payment_users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM payment_users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM payment_users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM payment_users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_services WHERE available = TRUE AND service_fee > 50;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com' AND phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, service_id FROM user_services WHERE service_id IN (SELECT service_id FROM services WHERE service_name = 'Authentication');
SELECT method_name, method_type FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '<user_id_here>'
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_name LIKE '%car%'
SELECT u.username, s.service_name FROM users u JOIN user_services us ON u.user_id = us.user_id JOIN services s ON us.service_id = s.service_id
